list.title: Senior Software Engineer @ Sonder
list: Developed dynamic pricing system in Python to price inventory through automation based on supply/demand.
Developed 3rd party distribution system in Ruby to sync inventory on Airbnb, Booking.com, Expedia, etc.
Maintained gigantic legacy Ruby on Rails codebase.

list.title: Software Engineer @ Morgan Stanley
list: Developed Python project to collect data from in-house and vendor sources (like Jira, BitBucket, Splunk, Sonar, etc.), analyze it and present it to devs (badges to encourage best practices) and to upper management (metrics/charts to guide decision-making).
Developed several self-service web apps in Typescript/Angular2 (querying agile/devops metrics, JIRA admin).

list.title: Programmer @ Framestore VR
list: Developed Unreal Engine 4 plugin in C++ for importing art assets from Shotgun into Perforce.
Developed automation code in Python to detect changed assets, generate and upload turntables for review.

list.title: Programmer @ Borealys Games
list: Developed UI and various gameplay systems in Unity (C#) on Mages of Mystralia.

list.title: Software Developer @ CAE
list: Developed web apps in C#/Javascript to help with project management and scheduling.
<a href="https://github.com/strategineer/speedrun-tools-peb">Pig Eat Ball Speedrunning Tool<a/>: Pig Eat Ball game mod for speedrunning (C#).
